metadata.title: CVE-2024-21910 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: TinyMCE versions before 5.10.0 are affected by a cross-site scriptingvulnerability. A remote and unauthenticated attacker could introducecrafted image or link URLs that would result in the execution of arbitraryJavaScript in an editing user's browser.

criterions.comment: tinymce: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
